channel.title: Squeal of fortune
channel.description: does anybody know a better script for squeal of fortune because on mine it lands on common every single time, i played it 172 times and not one time i got on uncommon, rare, super rare... (718 btw)

item.title: Squeal of fortune
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“B0SS, post:7, topic:540628”][quote author=N_A link=topic=659490.msg4410345#msg4410345 date=1393392536]

Random r = new Random(); int spin = r.nextInt(99) + 1; System.out.println(spin <= 65 ? "I'm a common roll!" : spin <= 85 && spin > 65 ? "I'm an uncommon roll!" : spin <= 95 && spin > 85 ? "I'm a rare roll!" : "I'm a super rare roll!");
[/quote]where would i add this? SquealOfFortune.java?[/quote]You will need to incorporate the idea into the mini-game. If that file exists then there’s a high chance it will be done there.

Read full topic

"I'm an uncommon roll!" : spin <= 95 && spin > 85 ? "I'm a rare roll!" : "I'm a super rare roll!");[/quote]where would i add this? SquealOfFortune.java?

[/quote]well what file would i do that in, because honestly i would of done that by now if i knew how to cause ive tried so many things and the items just become null[/quote]It’s your source not mine, how should I know? Search for the name of the mini-game and see if that gets you anywhere.
